documents.document: @robotexplosion @ohyoufox ah that makes more sense! There needs to be a sewing machine emoji too. Our any sewing ones (my phone is limited).
@robotexplosion you're getting engaged tonight???!? @ohyoufox
@_victoriajayne_ As long as you're not doing more than the speed limit, and can make the manoeuvre safely, then sure.

@dairymanNZ Mate, you're dreaming.
(Blushing horribly at that unintentional #NoContext blunder).
@StuFlemingNZ @dairymanNZ I would do the latter.
@StuFlemingNZ @dairymanNZ I'm going to slightly disagree with you there, as the cheese goes on top to hold everything in place.
@dairymanNZ @StuFlemingNZ And if you drain the juice off the pineapple chunks first you can drink it while you wait for the pizza to cook.
@StuFlemingNZ @dairymanNZ If it's making the pastry soggy you're doing it wrong.
@hebehu Alas I fear it's highly unlikely I shall ever get to Grandma. I shall have to wait to see if I ever get Great-Auntied :)
Then realised in a month or two I'll be the same age my mum was when she became a grandma for first time. There is no way I feel that old.
TFW one of your sibling's friends posts a picture of their grandchild starting school. Suddenly feel really old...
@wellingtonista @MorganGodfery @DavidSlack I had a great conversation with two this morning. They were waiting for Portrait Gallery to open.
Why would a private investment firm be doing phone polling about immigration policies? (I declined to answer. Seemed way too political atm).
@StuFlemingNZ That would be simpler! :D
Basically I'm standing here trying to not dance around like a toddler who needs the loo. It makes great customer service difficult.
Oh dear, it's one of those days where one customer spends 20 minutes browsing, next one comes in 2 minutes before they leave. Rinse/repeat.
@theunfocused @Katieshould An epsom salts bath and way too much pizza. :)
@Tash2point0 Let me know if you need someone to come in and take care of him for a few hours so you can get some sleep.
@theunfocused @Katieshould It took until Monday. Back to self now. But boy, did I hurt on Saturday (spent all day helping them then too).
Spent the evening shampooing the carpets at friends' new house before they shift in. I'm not sure I'll be able to move tomorrow. #HardYakka
@saycheeselouise At home we spend a lot of time together, but doing our own thing. Him Photography & CricInfo, me illustration & twitter.
@saycheeselouise He's also an introvert, but his work has less interaction, so he still has energy to catch up with friends 2-3x a week.
@saycheeselouise Professionally I work in the extravert space quite a lot, so on my own time tend towards very introverted.
@Capt_Caffiend just realised I tweeted this from wrong account. I'll probably have more scraps later in the year...
@antDigital And you know this because your his dealer? Or do you partake with him? If it's true, what horrors is he escaping? @Jess_McAllen
@StuFlemingNZ It's beautiful right now. Who knows what it will do next. It's all part of the fun!
@mellopuffy Thanks. I'll go to the chemist and ask (I hope one is open - the one I normally go to is closed because of eq damage still).
@mellopuffy Is there a brand name for that? (Is it something I might have already in the bathroom?)
@Artandmylife It is kind of remiss of me to not have that growing in the house. I shall have to go find a pharmacy.
Is there anything I can do to soothe them? I tried SOOV gel but had to wash it straight off because it made it even worse. This is horrible.
I just got an electric razor. Used it for the first time on my armpits this am and it has broken skin and grazed them. It's so painful. ðŸ˜±ðŸ˜¢
@Artandmylife (If the car was here I might have got pizza. Or cream and mushrooms.)
@Artandmylife The car isn't here. Also, today was the use by date on the steak. I found some white wine. I wish I had cream and mushrooms.
And I'm feeling really lazy, and not really like cooking. :(
I have steak to cook for dinner, and I have to have it tonight. But I don't think I have red wine for the sauce and this is a tragedy.
@bewarethefish Poor thing. Make sure you do the rehab exercises. Sprained ankles really suck.
@bewarethefish Ouch! I hope it's just aches, and you haven't broken or sprained anything. ðŸš‘
@giselledraws @Capt_Caffiend @PeopleofNZ @nzJayZee I reckon. Gotta be more on to it tomorrow when I'm at the shop, with 3 accts to wrangle!
@Capt_Caffiend @PeopleofNZ @giselledraws @nzJayZee I really thought I'd checked I was tweeting that from the right account too... #Oops. â˜ºï¸
Aww thanks for the retweets @Capt_Caffiend @PeopleofNZ @giselledraws and @nzJayZee :)
@amscraig Erihapeti is Elizabeth, could it be a variation of that (like Lisbeth, Elspeth etc)?
Just realised I've been going out with my husband for 19 years today. That means in a year it'll be 20. How did I get old enough for that?
@GrowFromHereNZ Oooh, on this day in 1998 I went on a first date that's still going. :)
@johubris @BR3NDA @starlajo I should probably rescind my application forthwith. I barely do my own dishes. I have a machine for that...
@johubris @BR3NDA My friendship skills are pretty much limited to the odd well-timed pun. And amending song lyrics. But I'm out of practice.
@BR3NDA @johubris That beats my application. I was going to ask if the position came with copious amounts of rhubarb champagne.
@ReaverBait Have you checked your oil and water recently? (I'm assuming your handbrake is off?)
@Artandmylife @theunfocused (I'm more focused on limiting future acquisitions than getting rid of existing stuff. Fabric is my downfall.)
@Artandmylife @theunfocused She limits the joy you have in keeping things? Well then she isn't bringing you joy, is she? #OutSheGoes!
@theunfocused @Artandmylife I have decided that Marie Kondo has no influence over me, because keeping stuff I like brings me happiness.
@GrowFromHereNZ I might just make the effort to go to this - I haven't been to an A&P Show in years. #RuralUpbringing
@GrowFromHereNZ oh! When is it?
@Capt_Caffiend thanks!
First garment of the year made, and first time using my new-to-me coverstitch machine. Tee-shirt from scrap stash. https://t.co/Wu4X1QzwLX
@theunfocused Next time you come to Wellington I will shout you one! (I will even research where to find GF ones for you).
@theunfocused This is far too likely the final outcome. #NONONO
Trying to convince myself I need neither a milkshake or a muffin and not doing particularly well at it. Can I last the last hour at work?
A plea: If you're planning in using public transport, dial back your perfume/cologne a notch. Scent allergies are a real thing.
@Fof1967 You say they "seem" ok with it. Have you tried valuing their opinions by asking for them rather than assuming? @kiwibardy
@mikokiko Probably better that than it happening with a needle and iceblock. (I'm not saying I agree with it either though).
@mikokiko Really common to do it very early in some cultures.
@saycheeselouise It's really nice when it gets taken seriously though. I'm never trying to be difficult. Just avoid throwing up.
@saycheeselouise I get so many blank stares when I ask if something has capsicum in it, or if the feta is from goat or cow milk.
@saycheeselouise Some people literally cannot conceive that other people may be affected by food that they can eat without problems.
Tfw you get home after a week spent in baches & cabins, absent-mindedly turn on the tap in your kitchen and hot water comes out! #wizardry
@StuFlemingNZ @theunfocused If you turn this phone off to conserve battery, it turns itself back on to warn you the battery is low.
Going to stop whinging now. Not enough battery left to continue...
Two hours left on the ferry ðŸš¢ Less than 10% battery left on my phone ðŸ“± My book isn't capturing my interest. And it's fishing ðŸŽ£ on the telly.
@harrismint @bad_emma_bad That question should be a year or two off yet, shouldn't it?
@Capt_Caffiend Let's plan a catch up in the next week or so. It's been ages!
@Capt_Caffiend in about 2 hours. ðŸ˜…
@StephanieMarija We normally go Bluebridge. Interislander was only option this time. Boat down was good. Will avoid this one in future.

@Capt_Caffiend We didn't have any other option when we booked. ðŸ˜¢
@GrowFromHereNZ It's not a comfortable feeling, but it's an important realisation to come to.
@sulufiti @newzedland I wonder how well received it will be? Many people I know were burnt by SwipeHQ. Most now use bank-backed solutions.
@StephanieMarija you are lucky there is a quiet room on yours. All the seating on this one is in cafÃ©s, bars, or the tv viewing room. ðŸ˜
About to embark on the final leg of the great NZ summer holiday island swap.
@gamerswift13 Haha, whereas I'm always getting told that my fear about the forces of nature etc are irrational...
@robotexplosion @This_Is_Alexis_ I think twitter thinks less often means only 2/3 times that I log in instead of every time.
@gamerswift13 My thought was contaminated liquefaction or a hidden sinkhole?
@EmmaMakes I've found it very useful for helping me shutoff these last couple of weeks, which is something I really needed to do.
@BR3NDA There's alerts for that? Suddenly switching from Windows with its out-of-date app doesn't seem so appealing...
@StuFlemingNZ I shall revel in my anonymity next time I visit Dunedin!
@theunfocused You do follow my other account too, and we regularly interact. But it is also slightly reassuring to know link is not obvious!
@kiwibardy also. Hot chocolate. Coffee is nasty. ðŸ˜’
@kiwibardy It had to be big to hide my very big brain. ðŸ˜Ž
@theunfocused Well that's reassuring ðŸ˜…

One of the issues with using my personal account over my on-brand one is that moment of do-they-know-who-I-am panic when replying to tweets.
Having a two person party on the beach with my husband. Using our one bar of reception to alternate dj duty on Spotify. #TheFutureIsNow
@dairymanNZ A box of fluffy ducklings?
Shetland ponies are high on my list of cutest animals ever. https://t.co/CgJgVlwqK9
I've been hanging with this little miss. https://t.co/C61ieBvsft
@buzzandhum I am somewhat confused by the logistics of it, but I don't want to think too much about it.
@bunnigaru Why not both?
@WardrobeFlair That sounds like you had a decent New Year's eve then!
@buzzandhum I think it's the grammar and editing of that article they're referring too. Mixed tenses, and who is Foti?
I have to stay awake until Midnight. It's not so much New Years, but my BFF in Paris turns 40 tomorrow, I'm always first with B'day wishes.
